name: Market Plexus
tag_list: supply-chain-management, b2b-networking, b2b, networking, professional-networking, industry-specific-networking, supply-chain-management-platform, business---to---business-networking-platform
overview: Market Plexus is an online, industry-specific, supply chain management focused, business-to-business, networking platform. Market Plexus facilitates the ability of organizations to find and connect with suppliers and buyers based upon specific search criteria and customer requirements, and stay informed of industry-specific best practices, trends and events. Market Plexus allows organizations to easily communicate with businesses and individuals throughout the supply chain. In using Market Plexus, organizations will experience growth and expand through the generation of new business connections and the development of enhanced business relationships.
